text: Shawn Darnell Fonteno, also known as Solo, is an American actor and rapper. He is best known as the voice and the motion capture performer of Franklin Clinton in the video game Grand Theft Auto V (2013). He is also the cousin of rapper Young Maylay who voiced Carl "CJ" Johnson, the protagonist of Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas. Fonteno was born in Los Angeles, California, and grew up in neighborhood of Watts. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:African- American movie actors Category:African-American voice actors Category:Rappers from California
title: Shawn Fonteno
